document.full_text: china's li na proved her australian open runners-up spot in january was no fluke by repeating the trick and reaching the french open final after a commanding win over a windswept maria sharapova on thursday.
document.title: li carries asia's hopes into french final
lines_and_colors: china's li na proved her australian open runners-up spot in january was no fluke by repeating the trick and reaching the french open final after a commanding win over a windswept maria sharapova on thursday.
